Title: Twilight
Plot: John Sr. ends up disappearing after arguing with Tommy about their living conditions. Tommy is none too thrilled with Lou's latest love interest, while Jerry's new woman might  prove to be dangerous for him. Also, Sean and Maggie meet with the priest to discuss their upcoming wedding.
GuestStars: Jack Hammel,  William Hill,  Susan Misner,  Manny Perez,  Paul Thornton,  Cornell Womack
